item.name: graphql

graphql.query: mutation insert {user: insertusers(value: {id:"16170753686e37"name:"system"email:"system@papertrader.com"created:"2021-03-29T22:36:08.806748-05:00"}) {value {id name email created }}}

mutation insert {game: insertgames(value: {id:"16170764949940"created:"2021-03-29T22:54:54.100676-05:00"created_by:"16170764946e37"name:"system gen: test game"end:"0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"cap:"1000000.00"}) {value {id created created_by name end cap }}}

item.description:
# graphql endpoints

contains examples of interacting with papertrader domain objects against stargate's graphql api interface
